snippet: In addition to blacklisting Iranian petrochemical companies for the first time, the Obama administration punished businesses in other countries that help Iran evade oil sanctions.
abstract: Obama administration escalates efforts to isolate Iran economically, blacklisting Iranian companies in the petrochemical industry for the first time and punishing five businesses in four other countries for conspiring to evade American sanctions aimed at restricting Iranian oil sales and air transportation.
lead_paragraph: In addition to blacklisting Iranian petrochemical companies for the first time, the Obama administration punished businesses in other countries that help Iran evade oil sanctions.
